1354180.name: Divine Tactics
1354180.description:
Assume the mantle of a god in Divine Tactics, a mythic autobattler where your intellect is your greatest weapon. Forge an army from heroes and monsters of unique archetypes and roles, each awaiting your command.

The battleground is your domain, where you position your units with precision, and design formations where every hero has a purpose. Orchestrate their skills and abilities to create combos that shatter the enemy frontline, protect your key assets, and dismantle an opponent's strategy before it can begin.

Your true challenge lies in defeating the master strategies of other players. You will face the very armies they led to victory, their formations left behind as a challenge for all who follow. Analyze their formation, find the single flaw in their design, and deploy a counter-strategy to watch their grand design crumble to dust.

Pick. Position. Prevail.

This game uses licensed assets from SMITE.
